name: Dino Craft Survival Jurassic Dinosaur Island
name_original: Dino Craft Survival Jurassic Dinosaur Island
description:
Dino Craft Survival is a survival game in a post apocalyse world, where dinosaurs came back from grave. You have to discover a huge island full of dinosaurs. Start chopping trees for wood. Craft armor and weapons to fight wild dinosaurs. Craft clothes and instruments to move faster and gather resources. Don't starve, gather everything you can eat.

You have to find food, gather resources, craft weapons, instruments and armor. An cataclysm ended the world that we once knew. Everything's changed. The nature's changed. Once upon a time a human ruled the nature. Almost no humans remained. The world saw an outbreak of an unknown infection that destroyed almost all the human race. Can you survive at least one night? Depressing atmosphere of despair is going to follow you all around, making it even harder to stay alive.

Every day might become your last day. And now the survival of your character is only in your power! Keep an eye on your character’s life stats such as hunger and thirst, collect valuable resources for crafting, create weapons and transport of different types or use what you have at hand. No matter how effective you are with your weapon, survivor, or how hard your armor is you’ll still need to rest to survive the apocalypse. The dead apocalypse wasteland is a harsh place for survival, so start building your own shelter


- Explore the wilderness
- Building system
- Amazing craft system
- Craft everything you might need
- Craft armor and weapons for fighting
- Build your house from the ground up
- Variety of tools and weapons
- Dozens of equipment and weapons
- Day Night cycle
- Keep track of your health, or you won’t survive
- Full freedom, explore the huge island
- 20 different types of dinosaurs to encounter
